document.heading: Special Education Task Force Temporary Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-210, the “Special Education Task Force Temporary Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-711, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 4, 2002, and July 2, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-445 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-210 became effective on October 19, 2002.
